subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Politics and Government
Budgets and Budgeting
Relocation of Business
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. officials issued stern warnings about the club’s future after Minnesota lawmakers rejected a proposal to use public funds to pay for part of a $975 million stadium.
snippet: N.F.L. officials issued stern warnings about the club’s future after Minnesota lawmakers rejected a proposal to use public funds to pay for part of a $975 million stadium.
